description: Detects the creation of a schtasks that potentially executes a payload stored in the Windows Registry using PowerShell.
author: X__Junior (Nextron Systems)
Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: Scheduled Task Executing Payload from Registry
query: ((((process.executable:/.*\\\\[Ss][Cc][Hh][Tt][Aa][Ss][Kk][Ss]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:/[Ss][Cc][Hh][Tt][Aa][Ss][Kk][Ss]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)) AND process.command_line:/.*\/[Cc][Rr][Ee][Aa][Tt][Ee].*/ AND process.command_line:(/.*[Gg][Ee][Tt]\-[Ii][Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp][Rr][Oo][Pp][Ee][Rr][Tt][Yy].*/ OR /.*\ [Gg][Pp]\ .*/) AND process.command_line:(/.*[Hh][Kk][Cc][Uu]\:.*/ OR /.*[Hh][Kk][Ll][Mm]\:.*/ OR /.*[Rr][Ee][Gg][Ii][Ss][Tt][Rr][Yy]\:\:.*/ OR /.*[Hh][Kk][Ee][Yy]_.*/)) AND (NOT process.command_line.text:(*FromBase64String* OR *encodedcommand*)))
